From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He heard objects heading through the Earth, heading for him. He new what
they were.
"Slag!" He headed up to the surface. He was just coming through the
ground when the explosian sent him flying through the sky.
"Sweet Cybertron!"
He came falling down through the trees, and hit the ground. He was hurt.
bad. He opened a comm.
"Star Scream, I was trying to lead Inferno towards the base, but I was
hit with explsives. I'm injured. Need help." He strugled up.
"DrillBit, terrorize." He transformed to bot mode.
"ooh, my head." He started looking for Inferno and his attacker.
